entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming south 30 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
